name: potatofarm
description: PotatoFarm is a Sonolus server for testing charts.

scripts.compile:bin:windows:x64: nexe -i dist/app.js -r public -r package.json -t 12.9.1 --target windows-x64 -o dist/PotatoFarm-win-x64.exe
scripts.compile:bin:windows:x86: nexe -i dist/app.js -r public -r package.json -t 12.9.1 --target windows-x86 -o dist/PotatoFarm-win-x86.exe
scripts.compile:bin:linux:x64: nexe -i dist/app.js -r public -r package.json -t 12.9.1 --target linux-x64 -o dist/PotatoFarm-linux-x64
scripts.compile:bin:linux:x86: nexe -i dist/app.js -r public -r package.json -t 12.9.1 --target linux-x86 -o dist/PotatoFarm-linux-x86
scripts.compile:bin:mac:x64: nexe -i dist/app.js -r public -r package.json -t 12.9.1 --target mac-x64 -o dist/PotatoFarm-mac-x64
scripts.compile:bin:mac:x86: nexe -i dist/app.js -r public -r package.json -t 12.9.1 --target mac-x86 -o dist/PotatoFarm-max-x86
